0: The bed and pillows were wonderful very comfortable
These touches all add to the experience
Our room had a lake view and city view
The location was perfect for our family and trip
Also the hotel is in an ideal location for shopping eating and sight seeing
The service was exceptional the whole team was particularly kind to my child which was the icing on the cake
So it was nice that the 90 Michigan shopping mall was connected to the hotel
They ’re always willing to make sure that you have a wonderful stay
Housekeeping was very attentive engaged and aware of my presence need for towels toiletries etc
1: The restaurant at the property is solid
No challenges are too great for the FS team
I want to give this hotel 5 stars but the pool situation with the kids is out of control
While the lobby restaurant and bar are being renovated the service is still excellent as are the food and drinks
My son kept calling it the One Season
We complained three times but nothing changed
Sorry I am not staying at the Four Seasons to wear earplugs in order to sleep
Typically we stay at the Peninsula when in the city but decided to give this property a try
As if a sleepless night was not bad enough upon further inspection of the room we realized there was debris from prior guests that had not been cleaned
We thought it was strange that turndown service had left earplugs but there had not been any other warning prior to that
